plot: And abusive and morally-corrupt old lady, finds a way to convince her son to take her to one of his concerts. All thanks to good old emotional blackmail.
title: Solo hay una
plot_es: And abusive and morally-corrupt old lady, finds a way to convince her son to take her to one of his concerts. All thanks to good old emotional blackmail.
plot_en: And abusive and morally-corrupt old lady, finds a way to convince her son to take her to one of his concerts. All thanks to good old emotional blackmail.

produce.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión (EICTV)
